column5: just in case u did not know or you bought a atv used or second hand there is a recall on the warn winches from may 2001 to september 1 2005, It is for the 8 post contactor only it was sold in winch kits 2500 to 3500 lbs . I may stay on and heat up winch and possible fire   I got a notice in the mail from warn since I bought new in 2005, but for those that did not might want to check out  link to recall  http://www.warn.com/atv/recall_notice.shtml   troy
got mine in the mail yeterday too
